comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: In December 1913 there was a Philadelphia boxer named George Ashe in the news--could this be the man, with a different spelling of Ash/Ashe/Asch? George Ashe the boxer was born 1894 as Abraham George Rivkind in Russia; he was 5'8" and a middleweight. Died in 1972. boxrec.com/list_bouts.php?human_id=11281&cat=boxer Looks like him: boxrec.com/media/index.php?title=Human:11281

comment.author: 8560391@N03
comment._content: Hi Penny. Yes, I believe that is the same man, with a slightly different spelling.
